name: fastapi-auth
description: Full-stack authentication application with FastAPI and React

scripts.db:start: docker run --name fastapi_auth_db -e POSTGRES_USER=myuser -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=mypassword -e POSTGRES_DB=mydb -p 5432:5432 -d postgres:16
scripts.db:stop: docker stop fastapi_auth_db && docker rm fastapi_auth_db
